content.text:
About App Center
For Partners and Developers
Go to App Center
Power your marketing with Semrush App Center
Discover select marketing tools in one place.
Browse all apps
Semrush App Center is the go-to spot for marketers looking for best-in-class marketing solutions.
Our marketplace features select apps that cover the widest range of your marketing needs — from video rank tracking on YouTube to creating compelling banners for social media.
We handpick each solution to make sure you only get the top apps, providing you with the famous Semrush customer support and taking care of everything from billing to the sign-up process.
Exclusive pricing
All the apps featured within our App Center come with a special price and a free trial so you can try each app for yourself and see if it truly meets your needs.
Semrush quality check
The Semrush team carefully selects each solution. No more hassle and spending hours searching for marketing solutions — we’ve done the job for you so you can focus on the things that matter.
Single sign up
You can use each app right within the Semrush interface. So don’t worry about forgotten passwords and missing bookmarks — everything you need is now located within one platform.
Marketing solutions from A to Z
Semrush App Center features selection of marketing apps that offer the widest range of marketing solutions: YouTube rank tracking, local SEO management, e-commerce keyword research, competitor ad scouting, and more.
Browse all apps
We have something for everyone.
Agencies
We have a selection of apps tailored specifically for agency needs — to help you land more clients, manage them, and take care of reporting.
Business
Semrush App Center allows your teams to focus on marketing activities that bring real business impact rather than wasting time testing and searching for solutions. You will also enjoy having a single point of entry to multiple tools.
Freelancers
We handpick some of the top industry solutions at a really affordable price so you can maintain your budget and flexibility when taking on new tasks and clients.
Browse all apps
Now, what’s not to like?
Enjoy the new hassle-free platform for finding the top marketing solutions.
Exclusive prices
Free trials
Single sign up
Browse all apps
Still have some questions?
We have you covered!
What is Semrush App Center?
Semrush App Center is the go-to spot for marketers looking for various marketing solutions. Each app, plugin, and extension featured within our online center is hand-picked by Semrush, ensuring quality, reliability, as well as exclusive deals. All the products are designed to seamlessly interoperate with Semrush Services.
How can I purchase or log into an app?
To purchase, sign up, or log into the app, simply use your active paid Semrush subscription. If you don't have a current Semrush subscription, please register here. After purchasing an app, you will be redirected to your new app page with no need to install anything else.
Do you offer a free trial for apps?
Yes, we provide a free trial for some apps made by Partners. See if the trial is available on the app pages.
Will I be automatically charged for the monthly app subscription once my free trial ends?
Yes. If you do not cancel your free trial before it ends, we begin charging you with an automatic monthly app subscription in addition to your current Semrush subscription.
What is a Limited offer and how does it work?
Limited offer allows you to use the app for free for a limited amount of time. Once the offer is expired, you will no longer have access to the app and will have to start using the app on a paid-for basis.
What personal data will be collected by the product?
All personal data and billing information that you grant to Semrush will be collected and stored by Semrush only. The personal data you shared with third-party partners will be collected and stored by them. For more information, please review the Privacy Policy of each app.
Can I cancel subscription anytime?
You can cancel your subscription by sending us a notice to app-center@semrush.com before the last day of your subscription term.
Can I list my app in Semrush App Center?
We always welcome new apps to be listed within Semrush App Center. Please send us your request to app-center@semrush.com. We will review your request and send a notification if your app has been selected to become a part of our app ecosystem.
Want to see your app featured on Semrush App Center?
If you would like to see your app proudly listed on Semrush App Center, make sure to reach out to us. Press the button below to learn more about becoming our partner.
Become a partner
Suggest a new app
Feel like we’re missing an app?
Feel free to let us know and we might take you up on that.
Submit an idea
